name: Hoover Trooper
description:
This project is currently a WIP as well as a fun side project while I finish university. You, the player wake up in a laboratory, given a hoover-styled weapon that can suck items up as well as dispense them at high velocities! Your goal? To get through all 3 bosses using the weapon given to you, with hopes of escaping !

Controls
WASD - Basic Movement Controls
Spacebar - Jump Left
Mouse Button - Fire Objects
Right Mouse Button - Suck Objects
